overview: Anthony Charles is President of SCS Agency, Inc. in Great Neck, New York. Mr. Charles has a Masters Degree from New York University in Finance and Management. He and his teams work together in a collaborative way to find the best solutions for risk management in business and in life. SCS Agency, in the insurance industry since 1926, deals in a diverse array of insurances for individuals and small to large businesses: auto, homeowner’s and renter’s, health, life, workers compensation, employee practices, frivolous claim, liability, environmental claims, D&O for non-profit and for-profit corporations, mechanical breakdown, heavy equipment and many more.

web_presences.title: Anthony Charles | President, SCS Agency, Inc.
